name: Debug Print Statement Detection
description: Similar pattern detecting debug print statements across different languages (Python print vs JavaScript console.log)

snippets.description: Detects Python print() statements as possible debug code
Detects JavaScript console.log/console.debug statements as debug code

notes: Same pattern for different languages - detecting debug output statements. Both use Minor severity, CodeQuality category, and recommend proper logging. Minor differences in string checks and recommendation text.
